Package com.esri.gpt.server.assertion.index

Assertion index.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AsnBaseIndexAdapter Base class for an adapter that handles read/write operations against a Lucene index of assertions.
AsnFilter A filter associated with a field and value.
AsnIndexAdapter Handles read/write operations against a Lucene index of assertions.
AsnIndexReference Represents a configuration reference to a Lucene based assertion index.
AsnIndexReferences Represents a collection of configured index references.
AsnRdfPart Represents the RDF fields associated with a assertion.
AsnSystemPart Represents the system fields associated with a assertion.
AsnUserPart Represents the user fields associated with a assertion.
Assertion An assertion that can be indexed as a Lucene document.
 

Package com.esri.gpt.server.assertion.index Description

Assertion index.
